item.title: Trump budget bill would increase deficit by $2.4 trillion, CBO says
item.description: Republicans' sweeping policy bill would increase the deficit by $2.4 trillion over the next decade, the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office said.

item.title: Pride marketing toned down this year amid Trump's DEI crackdown

item.title: Arrest in connection with Palm Springs bombing made at NYC's JFK airport
item.description: A person was arrested in New York City related to the investigation of last month's bombing outside a fertility clinic in Palm Springs, California.

item.title: How Charlene Kaye is rewriting the rules of pop
item.description: Charlene Kaye's musical parodies are racking up millions of views. But her story runs deeper.

item.title: President Trump's budget bill faces hurdles as Elon Musk calls it "a disgusting abomination"
